message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Let's be realistic, I'll take 60% since the money will be worth less in the next round.  It's still a good deal for you!
I'll compromise and give you a bit more, but I still think we can do better than 60%!
Inflation is starting to bite, Alice!  This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm getting desperate, but I still think we can find a better balance. This is my last offer before I walk away!
